entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosomin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Broadview 03:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

Humidity: 66 %

Wind: NNE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
